project.name: hudson.sensorbase
project.description: Runs junit, pmd, checkstyle, findbugs, and javadoc, failing the build if problems found. Invocation: ant -f verify.build.xml

target.name: hudson.basic
target.depends: clean, compile, checkstyle.tool, junit.tool, findbugs.tool, pmd.tool, jar, dist
target.description: Fast build for production purposes. No sensors.

target.name: hudson.daily.build
target.depends: clean, compile, checkstyle.tool, findbugs.tool, pmd.tool, jar
target.description: Builds and runs all QA stuff in preparation for sending sensor data. Note that the JUnit task is missing, since we get a DiskPageStore exception.
